name: AppointmentSetter
description:
We're a business to business appointment setting and lead generation firm, with an experience team of appointment-setting specialists. Our focus is to enhance the relationship between our clients and new potential customers. We do this by ensuring the products and services of our clients are properly represented before they meet with any new potential customers.
Our appointment setting service is designed not only to initiate this relationship, but also to ensure an improved bottom line for our clients at the end of the day. We provide services to clients comprising mainly of small to medium size businesses across Canada and the US, with whom we work with to develop strong partnerships. They come from a variety of industries across the board such as: Group Benefit Insurance, Advertising, Telecommunications, Mortgage and Finance, Real Estate, Manufacturing, Service, Health Care, Utility, Technology, Retail and many others. We know how much time potential clients waste, hiring and firing telemarketing companies, losing valuable time and money wasted on hourly rates for little results.
